title: The Peasants’ Revolt and a Cold War spy
itunes:title: The Peasants’ Revolt and a Cold War spy
itunes:subtitle: Author and broadcaster Melvyn Bragg introduces his latest historical novel, Now is the Time, which centres on the 14th-cenury uprising. Meanwhile, we talk to Andrew Lownie about his new biography of a key member of the Cambridge Spy Ring, Guy Burgess. ...
description:
Author and broadcaster Melvyn Bragg introduces his latest historical novel, Now is the Time, which centres on the 14th-cenury uprising. Meanwhile, we talk to Andrew Lownie about his new biography of a key member of the Cambridge Spy Ring, Guy Burgess.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
